casebody.data:
No. 09-1520. United States, Petitioner v. Reginald Keith Hagen. 562 U.S. 976, 131 S. Ct. 457,

178 L. Ed. 2d 314,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 7866. October 12, 2010.

Motion of respondent for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.

Justice Kagan took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion and this petition.

Same case below, 349 Fed. Appx. 896.
